title: Magic Marsh
paragraph: This island outside the starter region is characterized by a fabled forest and the overgrown and wet environment. But if you are brave enough to fight your way through the swamp, you can find lost artifacts or even treasure.

dynamicContents.content: Around the island, the heavy defender {{ Elder Spirit # article/units/elder-spirit }} can be found. And in the swamps outside the forest are the {{ Nyxis # article/units/nyxi }}. The Magic Marsh gives the player the possibility to recruit {{ Special units # article/units/special-units }}.

The fields around the portal are magic forest fields. The swamp is located outside of the magic forest. There are a few important special fields on the Magic Marsh: A magic treasure, one ancient artifact and a control field.
